{{ardayearheader|504|505|506|507|509|510|511}}
==Early==
* [[Doriath]] is utterly destroyed following the [[Second Kinslaying]] to never rise again.<ref name="Years">{{WJ|Years}}, p. 351</ref><ref name="Doriath">{{S|Doriath}}</ref>
* Keeping the [[Nauglamír]] and the [[Silmaril]], [[Elwing]] arrives at the [[Mouths of Sirion]] amongst a remnant of the [[Elves of Doriath|people of Doriath]].<ref name="Years"/><ref name="Doriath"/><ref group="note">In the final version of the [[The Tale of Years (The War of the Jewels)|''The Tale of Years'']] from ''[[The War of the Jewels]]'', Dior's wife is named '''[[Nimloth (elf of Doriath)|Lindis]]''', survives during the [[Second Kinslaying]] and escapes to [[Ossiriand]] alongside her daughter [[Elwing]] and with the [[Nauglamír]], but later she turns her way towards the [[Mouths of Sirion|Havens of Sirion]], hearing of the gathering of [[Exiles of Gondolin|exiles]] from [[Gondolin]] at that place in {{FA|511}}.</ref>
* [[Eluréd]] and [[Elurín]] are lost in the woods,<ref name="Doriath"/> but [[Maedhros]] repents and seeks unavailingly for the sons of [[Dior]]. Nothing certain is known of their fate, but some say that the birds succoured them and led them to [[Ossiriand]].<ref name="Years"/>

{{references|notes}}
